modName: RaceMenu Teen Presets for Vanilla Humanoid Races
summary: Using RaceMenu by Expired, teen presets have been generated starting with resources used for vanilla humanoid races.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][i]RaceMenu[/i] by Expired makes it easier to generate interesting characters and simple to share these characters with other NEXUS members.Â  Initially inspired by the amazing [i]Skyrim Beautiful Followers - SBF [/i]by hrk1025 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37861/?) and other follower mods from a number of other very creative artists (see "Inspiring Follower Mods" for a partial list) , I wanted to produce similarly younger looking player characters, but using RaceMenu rather than the brilliant[i] Enhanced Character Edit [/i]by ECE team (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?).

Each of the teen presets started with the first preset available for each of the humanoid (human and mer) races without alternate complexions, added dirt, scars or warpaint, although some of the female teen presets may have freckles and moles.

To use these presets, install the mod with a mod organizer or manually. Start a new game or open [i]Showracemenu, [/i]choose a race, select the [i]Preset[/i] tab and load your choice of male or female teen preset. Corresponding chargen nif and dds files are also available from the Sculpt tab.

I hope you find these presets useful and that you will share your creations with the rest of us. Enjoy.

Requirements:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]RaceMenu by Expired (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?)
SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org)[/size][/font]

Resources used:
Brows by Hvergelmir (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/)
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?)

Inspiring Follower Mods
BTRH Waifu by borntoraisehell1979 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53152/?)
Danariel Stormbow Follower with Body Changer by VRDaphni VRApollo and Danariel (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47649/?)
Followers of Aber by Aberin (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59970/?)
GCE Followers by pikona (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58329/?)
Kawaii Followers by Ghost (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27070/?)
rk Followers by rxkx22 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45578/?)
SKY Companions by SkylaSkyrim (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58363/?)
Skyrim Beautiful Followers - SBF by hrk1025 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37861/?)
SR Elf Followers by sarrai (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34063/?)

[/size][/font]
author: ThD17gj692
